data.content:
noun
plural ~ -ings
[count] :something good that can be found in a bad situation
If there's a silver lining to losing my job, it's that I'll now be able to go to school full-time and finish my degree earlier.
every cloud has a silver lining
used to say that every bad situation holds the possibility of something good
When my closest friend moved away, my mother reminded me that every cloud has a silver lining.
